# ChatraX Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview

MERN stack chat web application with real-time messaging, friend requests, and admin panel.

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, Socket.io-client
- Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Socket.io
- Theme: White and Lavender with Dark/Light mode toggle
- Fully responsive design

## Completed Steps

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Setup project structure (client & server)
- [x] Configure backend with MongoDB & Socket.io
- [x] Setup React frontend with Tailwind CSS
- [x] Implement authentication system
- [x] Create all pages and components
- [x] Implement chat and friend request features
- [x] Setup dark/light theme toggle
- [x] Create admin panel
- [x] Install dependencies and test

## Project Structure

```
ChatraX/
├── client/          # React frontend
└── server/          # Express backend
```
